item.title: Skittles Looks to Make Super Bowl History by Sending Elijah Wood to Make a Wacky Delivery
item.description: Amid increasing backlash over AI-generated ads, this commercial will be decidedly real, and likely very weird.

item.title: Meta Just Unveiled 5 New Performance Categories. They Probably Won’t Work for Your Company
item.description: Rating your workers in performance reviews is always tricky. Pigeon-holing them for bonuses? Definitely unsettling.

item.title: 5 Ways to Boost Workplace Productivity, According to McKinsey’s Analysis of 115 Programs
item.description: The consulting firm offers advice on setting up or improving health and wellbeing programs that benefit employees and businesses alike.

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Fires Back at AI Critics: ‘Extremely Hurtful’
item.description: Doom narratives are bad for business.

item.title: Nvidia Is Launching a Monster AI Supercomputer for Businesses. Here’s What You Need to Know
item.description: Here’s why the new DGX Station could be a boon for businesses working with AI.
